programme.sub-title: Dois caras nus em uma banheira

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Já que Butters parece encaixar tão bem com Cartman, Kyle e Stan, seus pais decidem ir com eles para passar um final de semana em Aspen. Ao chegar em Aspen, Stan, que não é nada experiente, se vê forçado a competir contra um campeão de ski.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan fuma uns cigarros de maconha que uns rapazes mais velhos deixaram e, pela noite, aparece um homem de 32 anos perdido e drogado que diz ser o Stan do futuro.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Um novo aluno mórmon se muda à South Park, mas não se dá bem com ninguém. Os rapazes querem que Stan comece uma briga com ele, mas na verdade, ele acaba se tornando seu amigo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os meninos ficam com raiva de Cartman quando ele come a parte mais gostosa das asas de frango, e decidem ignorá-lo. Todos começam a fazer o mesmo. Ao ser ignorado por todos, ele começa a pensar que está morto e que agora é um fantasma.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman promove o ódio na escola contra os meninos com cabelo vermelho, sardas e pele pálida, dizendo que eles não tem alma e não sobrevivem ao sol. Kyle, indignado, decide converter ele em um.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Al Gore visita a escola de South Park e tenta convencer Stan, Kyle, Cartman e Kenny para sair e caçar o perigoso homem-urso-porco. Ao ajudá-lo nesta missão, os rapazes acabam ficando presos em uma caverna.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A mãe do Cartman quer encontrar uma maneira de controlar o seu filho. Ela busca ajuda em alguns programas de televisão, mas sem muito sucesso. Eis que surge César Millan, um adestrador de cães que aceita o desafio.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O senhor Garrison precisa explicar a Teoria da Evolução em aula, mesmo que isso vá totalmente contra os seus valores. Enquanto isso, Cartman mal pode esperar o dia em que lançam o seu novo videogame preferido.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman resolve congelar a si mesmo em uma tentativa desesperada de suportar a espera do lançamento do novo Nintendo Wii. Ele acaba despertando apenas 500 anos mais tarde, em um futuro nada agradável, e o pior de tudo: sem Nintendo Wii!

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman faz uma brincadeira que terminou com um mal-entendido envolvendo seu pai e uma posição um tanto quanto constrangedora. Agora, Butters deve ir a um acampamento de cura gay.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Após ver um garoto com Síndrome de Tourette em uma loja, Cartman fica obcecado por isso. Ele descobre que se aparentar ter a doença Tourette, ele poderá dizer o que quiser sem precisar encarar consequências.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Depois de receber um resultado inesperado ao realizar um exame de amígdalas, Cartman fica cara a cara com sua própria mortalidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Em tempos de aflição e grande desespero, um jovem de South Park decide manter a ordem na cidade. Surge Guaxinim, que se torna o vigilante solitário de South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O sonho de Cartman de viver a vida de um pirata se tornará realidade, se ele conseguir chegar à Somália.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman é escolhido para fazer os anúncios da manhã na escola de South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O restaurante favorito de Cartman foi fechado e substituído por uma loja que vende maconha medicinal. Enquanto Randy quer conseguir uma prescrição médica para comprar maconha, Cartman fará de tudo para ter de volta sua amada galinha frita.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman quer se tornar um corredor da NASCAR, mas ele acha que não tem condições porque não é "pobre e suficientemente estúpido" para alcançar seus sonhos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman tem um ataque de raiva quando os tamanhos dos pênis dos garotos são colocados no mural da escola de South Park e acabda sendo enviado para uma terapia de controle da raiva.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Noventa e nove por cento dos alunos estão contra Eric Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman finalmente admite que é gordo e providencia imediatamente uma scooter para se locomover.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman consegue se infiltrar na agência de segurança nacional.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Token é considerado por Cartman uma ameaça a toda a humanidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os meninos criam uma empresa na qual eles não fazem nada, e enfim optam pelo nome "The Washington Redskins".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman ganha seu próprio banheiro dizendo que ele é "transginger" claro significado de transgenero.Segredo de Randy é revelado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman foi diagnosticado com ansiedade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman conta para seus amigos sobre o seu sonho em que apareciam uns alienígenas que o abduzem e lhe introduzem uma sonda anal. Mas ao que parece, não foi apenas um sonho, já que algo está enlouquecendo as vacas deste pequeno vilarejo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman ganha o concurso "Salve o nosso frágil planeta" e é anunciado que Kathie Lee Gifford viajará a South Park para entregar o prêmio a ele em mãos, então, Cartmam decide entrar em forma tomando as pastilhas de Aumento 4000.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman descobre a verdadeira identidade do seu pai. Uma tempestade de neve prende os garotos no hospital. A equipe do America’s Most Wanted está na cidade. A equipe e os moradores ficam isolados e consideram o canibalismo.
programme.sub-title: A Mãe do Cartman Continua Sendo uma Vaca

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes estão em um dia de passeio pelo planetário e um dos funcionários lava o cérebro deles com efeitos visuais para que eles queiram voltar para lá.
programme.sub-title: Roger Ebert deveria demitir os alimentos gordurosos

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman acha que é muito maduro para sair com Stan, Kyle e Kenny, e decide buscar novos amigos na internet, mas termina se metendo em vários problemas com pedófilos. Enquanto isso, Kenny tenta evitar que seus pais tenham outro filho.
programme.sub-title: Cartman entra para a ASNAMB (Associação De Sósias Norte-Americanos Do Marlon Brando)

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Todos acham que Cartman está muito gordo e decidem enviá-lo a um "Acampamento de Gordos" para perder peso. Por outro lado, Kenny está topando fazer qualquer coisa por dinheiro, e isso o leva às mais diversas insanidades.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Scott Tenorman é um rapaz do oitavo ano que engana Cartman ao vender seus pentelhos. Agora, ele fará o que for preciso para recuperar o seu dinheiro. Participação especial: Radiohead.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman recebe como herança de sua avó um milhão de dólares e decide cumprir seu maior sonho: comprar um parque de diversão somente para ele, no qual ele não precisa fazer fila para subir nos brinquedos, já que ninguém mais pode entrar.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se fantasia de um robô chamado "Genial-O 4000" e Butters acredita que ele de fato é um robô. Porém, a piada de Cartman se transforma em um pesadelo quando ele descobre que Butters tem um vídeo dele fantasiado de Britney Spears.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Heidi Turner quer iniciar uma dieta vegana com Eric Cartman, enquanto Kyle quer saber o motivo pelo qual ele ainda está com ela. Neste mesmo capítulo, veja como a popularidade do presidente diminui cada dia mais.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O diretor PC começa a nutrir sentimentos amorosos pela vice-diretora da escola. Terrance e Phillip querem assinar um contrato com a Netflix e Kyle está cansado de ser humilhado por Heidi e Cartman.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A mãe de Kyle faz um transplante fecal e os meninos recebem a missão de pegar o melhor microbioma.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes querem se destacar na aula de genética para irritar Terrance e estão tentando fazer um cruzamento entre o elefante de Kyle com a porca do Cartman, "Fofa".
programme.sub-title: Um elefante faz amor com um porco

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está se sentindo só por ser judio. Fora isso, ninguém acredita nele quando ele tenta convercer os cidadãos de South Park sobre a existência de Mr.Hankey, o cocô do Natal.
programme.sub-title: Sr. Hankey, o Poo de Natal

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes encontram um objeto misterioso em uma escavação escolar e saem no jornal. Barbra Streisand aparece na cidade buscando o tal objeto, pois é a última peça necessária para que ela possa se transformar em um monstro japonês gigante.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os garotos descobrem o que significa ser circuncidado e tentam salvar Ike do seu destino. O senhor Mackey é demitido, se entrega às drogas e se torna um hippie.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes estão viciados em "Chinpokomon" (uma paródia de Pokémon) e querem comprar os bonecos, os jogos e qualquer outra coisa relacionada com eles.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os rapazes precisam de dinheiro para investir em videogames. Então eles resolvem roubar dentes, já que a fada dos dentes paga por isso.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está doente e sua mãe está tentando curar ele através da sabedoria de medicina natural uma velha curandeira e seus colaboradores "nativos americanos". Enquanto isso, senhor Garrison se transforma em escritor de novelas românticas.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle que ir a um concerto, mas seus pais não deixam. Cartman sugere que ele vá à polícia e diga que seus pais o molestaram, para que assim eles sejam presos.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O primo do Kyle, que também se chama Kyle, veio de Connecticut para visitar sua mãe em South Park. Porém, apesar da mesma idade, os primos não tem nada em comum.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: A professora de arte coloca os alunos de castigo e decidem se vingar. Durante a noite, invadem sua casa e a enrolam em papel higiênico. Agora, a polícia está atrás dos responsáveis, e isso faz com que Kyle se arrependa.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle diz que, como presente de aniversário, sua mãe levará ele e três amigos para a Casa Bonita. A alegria de Cartman acaba quando Kyle decide convidar Stan, Kenny e Butters. Agora Butters precisa "desaparecer".

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Após passar por uma operação para mudar de sexo, o senhor Garrison finalmente se sente como uma verdadeira mulher. Enquanto isso, Kyle quer fazer uma cirurgia para ficar negro e assim, conseguir ser aceito pelo time de basquete.
programme.sub-title: A Nova Vagina Chique do Professor Garrison

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os locutores do show da baleia Jambú fazem com que as crianças acreditem que a baleia pode falar, e que ela se chama Willzyx, que está doente e morrerá se não regressar à sua casa na lua. Agora os meninos querem levar a baleia para a lua.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: O pai de Kyle compra um carro híbrido e tenta convencer todas as pessoas de que esta é a melhor opção para cuidar do planeta. Porém, ao brigar com todos em função de sua atitude esquisita, se muda para São Francisco com sua família.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman acha que os ataques do dia 11 de setembro fazem parte de uma conspiração, e se dispõe para trazer a verdade à luz. Enquanto isso, o senhor Mackey apenas quer saber quem foi o infeliz que defecou no mictório.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman jura que viu um duende. Ele está tão obcecado com isso, que inclusive faz uma aposta com Kyle para provar que os duendes existem. Eles encontram o duende, e agora Kyle precisa cumprir com a aposta.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam prisioneiros do Pentágono até contarem exatamente como chegaram à Terra da Imaginação. Cartman não desistirá da aposta e quer que Kyle chupe suas bolas, conforme o combinado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Quando estão na Terra da Imaginação, Stan e Butters tem que lutar contra um exército de forças imaginárias do mal. A Suprema Corte declara que as criaturas imaginárias não são reais e planeja destruir a Terra da Imaginação.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan e Kyle se tornam obcecados pelo Guitar Hero, chegando ao ponto de baterem recordes. Depois de um tempo Stan pensa que poderia ir mais longe na carreira com um parceiro diferente.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: As meninas do quarto ano fizeram uma lista secreta que dá nota a todos os garotos, do mais bonito ao mais feio. Os garotos roubam a lista e os resultados não são o que eles esperavam.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Enquanto a cidade está ocupada apontando culpados pela crise econômica, Randy apresenta uma solução para as dificuldades financeiras. Com a ajuda de todos os moradores, a cidade passa a viver sem qualquer economia.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stan se mobiliza para impedir que os japoneses matem todas as baleias e os golfinhos do mundo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: As últimas notícias sobre testes científicos realizados na escola de South Park revelam que alguns dos meninos estão viciados em sexo.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle, Cartman Kenny e Stan se juntam com os cidadãos de South Park e lutam bravamente contra a dominação de Nova Jersey em uma onda que está afetando todo o país

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle está "intestinalmente" envolvido no desenvolvimento de um novo produto revolucionário que será lançado pela Apple chamado HumancentiPad.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle participa do mais recente empreendimento de Cartman, a Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack.
programme.sub-title: Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Os garotos estão próximos de descobrir a verdade sobre o primeiro Dia de Ação de Graças da história dos Estados Unidos.
programme.sub-title: Dia de Ação de Graças no History Channel

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Ike chega à puberdade, mas Kyle se preocupa com o fato de que ele e seu irmão menor estão se distanciando. Dessa forma, Kyle o leva a uma apresentação ao vivo de seu programa de TV favorito.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Kyle ainda está pertubado pois Ike e seus amigos o chamam de vovó. Enquanto isso, vários hologramas estão à solta em South Park.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Cartman se considera um critico de restaurante on-line em South Park, e vai visitar o restaurante dos novos moradores da cidade.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Heidi Turner quer iniciar uma dieta vegana com Eric Cartman, enquanto Kyle quer saber o motivo pelo qual ele ainda está com ela. Neste mesmo capítulo, veja como a popularidade do presidente diminui cada dia mais.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: Oklahoma!
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

programme.title: Support Your Local Sheriff!
programme.desc: James Garner stars in this rollicking western spoof that has him taking on the job of a frontier town sheriff who must fend off villains (led by Walter Brennen) from every direction...all without breaking a sweat or dirtying his shiny black boots!

programme.title: Hour Of The Gun
programme.desc: Director John Sturges presents a reworking of the Wyatt Earp/Doc Holliday legend and the struggle for political control of Tombstone, with a marvelous trio of antagonists: James Garner as Earp, Jason Robards as Holliday, and Robert Ryan as Clanton.

programme.title: True Grit
programme.desc: The cantankerous Rooster is hired by a headstrong young girl (Kim Darby) to find the man who murdered her father and fled with the family savings.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier and Rod Steiger (who won a Best Actor Oscar® for his performance) shine in this classic mystery-thriller that took home five Academy Awards®, including Best Picture and Best Adapted Screenplay. Lee Grant and Warren Oates also star.

programme.title: The Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Bogart plays an escaped con who has nothing to lose. March is a suburban Everyman who has everything to lose - his family is held hostage by Bogart.

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: A man robbed of his name and his dignity strives to win them back, and gain the freedom of his people, in this epic historical drama from director Ridley Scott.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: In this edge-of-your-seat supernatural thriller featuring Hollywood's hottest stars, a study in fear escalates into a heart-stopping nightmare for a professor and three subjects trapped in a mysterious mansion.

programme.title: Fright Night
programme.desc: Meet Jerry Dandridge. He's sweet, sexy, and he likes to sleep in late. You might think he's the perfect neighbor. But there's just one thing you should know. Jerry prefers his drinks warm, red and straight from the jugular! Rated: R

programme.title: The Dark Half
programme.desc: A writer undergoes an operation that reveals a twin in his brain. He begins a double writing life, using a pseudonym for his disreputable best-sellers. When the pseudonym discovers he is to be eradicated, he goes on a murderous rampage.

programme.title: Friday the 13th
programme.desc: Camp Crystal Lake has been shuttered for over 20 years due to several vicious and unsolved murders. The camp's new owner and seven young counselors are readying the property for re-opening despite warnings of a "death curse" by local residents.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part II
programme.desc: Five years after the bloodbath at Camp Crystal, all that remains is the legend of Jason and his demented mother, who had murdered seven camp counsellors. At a nearby summer camp, the new counsellors are unconcerned about the warnings to stay away.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Ignoring Camp Crystal Lake’s bloody legacy, one by one they fall victim to the maniacal Jason who stalks them at every turn...

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part - IV: The Final Chapter
programme.desc: After his revival in a hospital morgue, the hockey-masked murderer fixes his vengeful attention on the Jarvis family and a group of hitherto carefree teenagers.

programme.title: Friday the 13th Part V: A New Beginning
programme.desc: This time he seems to have set his sights on the young patients at a secluded halfway house. And more than a few of his teen targets end up in half, in quarters... you name it, Jason does it.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part VI: Jason Lives
programme.desc: As a child, Tommy Jarvis did what many others died trying to do. He killed Jason Vorhees, the mass murderer who terrorized the residents of Crystal Lake. But now, years later, Tommy is tormented by the fear that maybe Jason isn’t really dead.

programme.title: Death Note: Matsuda
programme.desc: Matsuda, the task force member assigned to watch Misa, is eager to distinguish himself.

programme.title: Death Note: Makeshift
programme.desc: L's team discovers that the Yotsuba Group meet in secret to discuss the elimination of individuals who are troublesome to their company .

programme.title: Death Note: Performance
programme.desc: The Yotsuba Group hires Eraldo Coil to uncover L's identity.

programme.title: Death Note: Guidance
programme.desc: Misa succeeds in narrowing down the Kira suspects in the Yotsuba Group to one: Higuchi.

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy
programme.desc: Higuchi of the Yotsuba Group attempts to kill Matsuda of the task force, and is surprised when he doesn't die after 40 seconds.

programme.title: Death Note: Revival
programme.desc: Higuchi is captured and tells the investigators about the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Silence
programme.desc: Light, his memory recovered, orders Misa to begin killing after Higuchi dies.

programme.title: Death Note: Renewal
programme.desc: Light has removed everyone in his way and is closer to achieving his perfect world.

programme.title: Death Note: Abduction
programme.desc: A new investigator steps forward, Near, a central figure in the SPK, an organization that is trying to catch Kira without relying on L.

programme.title: Death Note: Impatience
programme.desc: Light, acting as L, reveals to Near that his sister Sayu has been kidnapped by someone wanting to trade her for the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Father
programme.desc: Light tries to discover where Mello and his Mafia associates are hiding and uses Misa's eyes to find the Death Note's current owner.

programme.title: Death Note: Justice
programme.desc: Mello busts into SPK headquarters to retrieve a photograph of himself to make sure he won't be killed by Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Transfer
programme.desc: Near contacts the Japanese task force and determines that Kira is among their members.

programme.title: Death Note: Selection
programme.desc: Star newscaster Kiyomi Takada becomes Kira's spokesperson to the world.

programme.title: Death Note: Scorn
programme.desc: Light pretends to investigate Kiyomi.

programme.title: Death Note: Vigilance
programme.desc: Aizawa figures out what's going on and tells Near, who already knows about the notes.

programme.title: Death Note: Malice
programme.desc: Light gives Kiyomi the order to finish off Near.

programme.title: Death Note: 1.28
programme.desc: Near, along with the SPK, meets Light and the task force at a warehouse for the final showdown.

programme.title: Death Note: New World
programme.desc: Though Mikami has written all the investigators' names in the Death Note, a minute passes and everyone is still alive.

programme.title: Death Note: Rebirth
programme.desc: Brilliant but bored high school student Light Yagami suddenly finds himself holding the power of life and death in his hand, the power of the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Confrontation
programme.desc: While the world's criminals continue to drop dead, L meets by computer with representatives from various nations.

programme.title: Death Note: Dealings
programme.desc: Ryuk, the Shinigami, or god of death, who dropped the Death Note into the human world, warns Light that someone is on his trail.

programme.title: Death Note: Pursuit
programme.desc: Light, now known to the world as Kira, tests the Death Note to understand the scope of its powers by killing off six convicts in various ways.

programme.title: Death Note: Tactics
programme.desc: Soichiro Yagami demands to meet with L in person when he finds out that L has secretly brought FBI agents into Japan.

programme.title: Death Note: Unraveling
programme.desc: Light meets a woman at the Police Department with an urgent message for the Kira task force.

programme.title: Death Note: Overcast
programme.desc: Light uses the Death Note to try to get rid of the woman who could get him captured, and is shocked when it doesn't work.

programme.title: Death Note: Glare
programme.desc: L insists on setting up bugs and cameras in the homes of Chief Yagami and Deputy Director Kitamura.

programme.title: Death Note: Encounter
programme.desc: The murders continue, and L grows suspicious of Light's too perfect behavior and decides to investigate him on his own.

programme.title: Death Note: Doubt

programme.title: Death Note: Assault
programme.desc: As predicted on the tapes sent to Sakura TV, news anchors and commentators who expressed doubt about Kira die one by one.

programme.title: Death Note: Love
programme.desc: With a second Kira now on the loose, L asks Light to join the task force and pose as the real Kira in order to catch the copycat.

programme.desc: Light goes to Aoyama to discover the identity of the second Kira before L becomes more suspicious.

programme.title: Death Note: Friend
programme.desc: Light and Misa show each other their Death Notes, and Light asks Misa to have her shinigami Rem get rid of L.

programme.title: Medusa Deluxe
programme.desc: A murder at a competitive hairdressing competition launches a devilishly funny whodunnit, where passion for hair verges on obsession.

programme.title: Out of Time

programme.title: Paid in Full
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: Luv
programme.desc: An 11-year-old boy gets a crash course in what it means to be a man when he spends a day with the ex-convict uncle he idolizes.

programme.title: Obsession

When a student writes the police code for homicide, 187, inside a textbook owned by teacher Trevor Garfield, he feels threatened.

programme.title: Paid in Full
programme.desc: A young man from Harlem, forced to cope with the 1980s drug scene, builds an illegal empire, only to have a crisis of conscience. Featuring the hit soundtrack with songs by Eric B. & Rakim, Boogie Down Productions, Guy, and Jay-Z.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: A black police officer is pushed to the edge, taking out his frustrations on the privileged community he's sworn to protect.

programme.desc: Tong Huo-wan (Jackie Chan) seeks redress from the man responsible for his master's death, but becomes entangled in a feud between a local clan and gangsters.

programme.title: Operation Condor

programme.desc: Jackie Chan is a fortune hunter whose ex-girlfriend is kidnapped by an evil cult! Things kick into high gear when her fiancée, an old friend of Jackie’s, asks him for help in securing the kidnappers’ lone demand: the priceless Armor of The Gods!

programme.desc: The squad arrives in the Land of the Waves and learn that an evil businessman has taken over the land.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Kakashi gets trapped inside Zabuza’s Water Prison.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: A mysterious tracking ninja shows up and kills Zabuza before Kakashi can.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Kakashi is unsatisfied with the outcome of his battle with Zabuza.

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Sakura witnesses the hardships that the people of Land of Waves endure under Gato’s rule
programme.sub-title: The Land Where a Hero Once Lived

programme.title: Naruto
programme.desc: Naruto concentrates on his chakra training when a mysterious figure appears.
programme.sub-title: Battle on the Bridge! Zabuza Returns!!

programme.title: Lila & Eve
programme.desc: Lila, a grief-stricken mother reeling from her son's murder, attends a support group where she meets Eve, who urges her to take matters into her own hands to track down her son's killers. They soon embark on a journey of revenge, but also recovery.

programme.title: Kalifornia
programme.desc: A graduate student and his girlfriend set out on a cross-country road trip to research a book they are writing on serial killers. Along the way, they pick up an ex-con and his girlfriend who will take them on a ride they'll never forget.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: A black police officer is pushed to the edge, taking out his frustrations on the privileged community he's sworn to protect.

programme.title: Brawl in Cell Block 99
programme.desc: When Bradley (Vince Vaughn) is sent to prison, he is forced to commit acts of violence that turn the place into a savage battleground.

programme.title: Killer Elite
programme.desc: A special-ops agent must rescue his mentor.

programme.title: Honest Thief
programme.desc: Wanting to lead an honest life, a notorious bank robber (Liam Neeson) turns himself in, only to be double-crossed by two ruthless FBI agents.

programme.title: Sleepless
programme.desc: An undercover Las Vegas police officer with a connection to the criminal underworld scours a nightclub in search of his kidnapped son.

programme.title: Bad Ass
programme.desc: A Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime.

programme.title: Origin Story
programme.desc: When Kulap Vilaysack was 14, she took her father's side in an argument and her mother replied, 'Why are you defending him? He's not your real dad.' Twenty years later, she's finally ready to explore what that means.

programme.title: Meet the Patels
programme.desc: In this real-life "My Big Fat Greek Wedding," an Indian-American man gets help from his parents and extended family in looking for a wife in the traditional Indian way.

programme.title: Grizzly Man
programme.desc: Werner Herzog (Cave of Forgotten Dreams) crafts a compelling documentary look at wildlife preservationist Timothy Treadwell, who lived unarmed among grizzly bears in Alaska.

programme.title: Monty Python Live at the Hollywood Bowl
programme.desc: The legendary live show from the Monty Python troupe. Performing many of their greatest sketches from Monty Python's Flying Circus and two Monty Python specials, Monty Python's Fliegender Zirkus, live from the Hollywood Bowl in 1980.

programme.title: Oasis: Supersonic
programme.desc: A riveting look at the meteoric rise of seminal '90s rock band Oasis, immersing us in the raucous rock stars' fast-paced world of electrifying music, wild debauchery, and epic fraternal feuding. From the Oscar winning producers of "Amy".

programme.title: Jerry Lee Lewis: Trouble in Mind
programme.desc: An electrifying glimpse into the life of music legend Jerry Lee Lewis — from his rise to the top of the Billboard charts to his tumultuous fall from grace. Featuring unparalleled performances from rock & roll's wildest pioneers.

programme.title: Monty Python Live at the Hollywood Bowl
programme.desc: The legendary live show from the Monty Python troupe. Performing many of their greatest sketches from Monty Python's Flying Circus and two Monty Python specials, Monty Python's Fliegender Zirkus, live from the Hollywood Bowl in 1980.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dollars
programme.desc: The Man With No Name (Clint Eastwood) receives offers from two gangs terrorizing a small town and accepts both, setting in motion a plan to destroy the criminals in a series of brilliantly orchestrated setups, showdowns, and deadly confrontations.

programme.title: For A Few Dollars More
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood returns as the Man With No Name, who teams up with equally lethal Colonel Mortimer (Lee Van Cleef) in pursuit of a sadistic killer and his band of desperadoes in this non-stop action classic from legendary director Sergio Leone.

programme.title: Fear of a Black Hat
programme.desc: A mockumentary chronicling the rise and fall of NWH, a not particularly talented--or particularly bright but always controversial--hip-hop group.

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Shirley MacLaine, Gene Hackman, Dennis Quaid and Richard Dreyfuss star in Mike Nichols' hilarious blockbuster film about a very real mother-daughter relationship set against the backdrop of today's Hollywood. Rated: R

programme.title: Jawbreaker
programme.desc: "The beautiful ones. The flawless four. Everyone wanted to be them. You know 'em". First there's Courtney "Satan-in-heels" Shayne and her pawn, the dense but dangerous Marcie Fox, a legend in her own little mind. Rated: R

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: The Big Hit
programme.desc: Lou Diamond Phillips, Mark Wahlberg, Christina Applegate, Antonio Sabato Jr. and Lela Rochon star in this story of a hitman who kidnaps the teenage child of his boss.

programme.title: Multiplicity
programme.desc: Michael Keaton and Andie MacDowell star in director Harold Ramis' brilliant comedy about a man who clones himself to save his marriage, and then almost loses his wife to himself! Keaton takes on four hilariously distinct roles.

programme.title: The Truman Show
programme.desc: Truman doesn’t realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: Boxcar Bertha
programme.desc: Set in the Depression era of the 1930s, a young woman and three men rob trains and plan a kidnapping. The men are caught and the woman becomes a prostitute. Based on "Sister of the Road" by Boxcar Bertha Thomson as told to Ben L. Reitman.

programme.title: The Molly Maguires
programme.desc: Life is rough in the coal mines of 1876 Pennsylvania. A group of Irish emigrant miners, known as the Molly Maguires, fights against the cruelty of the mining company with sabotage.

programme.title: The Duellists
programme.desc: Keith Carradine and Harvey Keitel star in this dramatic film about two officers in Napoleon’s army who violently confront each other in a series of duels.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven Ride!
programme.desc: When his wife is killed, Marshal Chris Adams (Lee Van Cleef) discovers that a ruthless horde of marauders has killed all the men -- and will come back for the women -- in a nearby border town...unless The Magnificent Seven can stop them!

programme.title: The White Buffalo
programme.desc: Charles Bronson and Will Sampson star as Wild Bill Hickok and Chief Crazy Horse in this one-of-a-kind western that finds both western legends braving the snowy wilderness in search of the demon that haunts them both, the fabled White Buffalo!

programme.title: Brannigan
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: The Molly Maguires
programme.desc: Life is rough in the coal mines of 1876 Pennsylvania. A group of Irish emigrant miners, known as the Molly Maguires, fights against the cruelty of the mining company with sabotage.

programme.title: The Duellists
programme.desc: Keith Carradine and Harvey Keitel star in this dramatic film about two officers in Napoleon’s army who violently confront each other in a series of duels.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi meets a mysterious Egyptian named Shadi who enters Yugi's mind with the Millennium Key. What are these Millennium Items, and do they hold the answer to the mystery behind the Shadow Games?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends return from the Duelist Kingdom only to meet a young girl named Rebecca who demands that Grandpa return Blue-Eyes White Dragon to her.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Rebecca mistakenly believes that Grandpa stole the Blue-Eyes White Dragon from her grandfather. Yugi must defend the Blue-Eyes White Dragon to teach her that it's not the power of the cards, but the heart that's in them that counts.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The two-faced Board of Directors of Kaiba Corporation trap Kaiba inside a virtual reality game. Mokuba recruits Yugi and Joey to free Kaiba from this ultimate game where losing equals death!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The quest for Kaiba continues with a little help from… Mai? But can YUGI and friends adapt to a virtual world where the rules and strategies keep changing every step of the way?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends rescue Kaiba, but they are still stuck in the game! The only exit is past a Five-Headed Dragon, but in the difficult duel, Joey, Mokuba, and Mailose all their life points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Duke Devlin defeats Joey and humiliates him in public, forcing Yugi to challenge Duke to a duel. However, this will not be a Duel Monsters duel, but a new game named Dungeon Dice Monsters!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In exchange for Joey's freedom, Yugi agrees to give up Duel Monsters forever if he loses. Unfamiliar with the rules, Yugi gets off to a rough start.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi uses his innate gaming skills to turn the tables on Duke, but Duke has one more rule to mention: All creatures take up territory on the grid-like board. With no room to summon any new monsters, Yugi's position is helpless!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Duke's all-powerful Orogoth The Relentless dices Yugi's entire cadre of monsters into shreds, Yugi only has one turn left before he loses all his heart points!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: An arcane fortune teller steals the Millennium Puzzle and Yugi must defeat him in a duel to win it back.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The mysterious menace controlling Bandit Keith shatters the Millennium Puzzle into pieces before setting the dueling arena ablaze. Can Yugi put the Millennium Puzzle back together and save the spirit before the entire room is engulfed in flames?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of Duel Monsters is revealed. Using the magic of the Millennium Necklace, Egyptian historian Ishizu Ishtar shows Kaiba how Duel Monsters was played millenniums ago.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The spirit of the Millennium Puzzle realizes that his memories of ancient Egypt have faded, but Tea helps him uncover the mysteries of his past.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi learns that he was a powerful Pharaoh who saved the world five thousand years ago, and he must now save the world again.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Joey into a duel. If he loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's time to master new rules and monsters; let the Battle City Tournament commence! In the first duel of the tournament, Yugi challenges the Rare Hunter to win back Joey's Red-Eyes Black Dragon.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 1 - Battle City Begins

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi figures out the Rare Hunter's strategy to summon the almighty Exodia, but it's too late to stop him. The Rare Hunter already has four pieces of Exodia in his hand, and the fifth and final piece is on top of his deck.
programme.sub-title: Yugi Vs. Rare Hunter Part 2 - Up Against Exodia

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The psychic duelist Espa Roba defeats Rex Raptor as easy as a chumpasaurus, and Joey's next on his hit list. What chance does Joey have when Espa Roba has the telepathic ability to read all the cards in Joey's hand?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey discovers that Espa Roba's extrasensory perception was a hoax, that he's not yet free from Espa's mental manipulations.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magician duelist Arkana transports Yugi to the world's most lethal dueling arena where the loser gets sent to the Shadow Realm. Yugi must win this duel or he'll lose much more than his Dark Magician.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's Dark Magician versus Dark Magician! However, while Yugi only controls one Dark Magician, Arkana has three residing in his deck. Though outnumbered, Yugi will never give up as long as he believes in the heart of the cards.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: To counter Arkana's Dark Magician, Yugi pulls a rabbit out of his hat: the Dark Magician Girl!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The trickster Weevil Underwood spins a web of lies to bait Joey into a lopsided duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey swats Perfectly Ultimate Great Moth only to have Weevil let loose the ferocious Insect Queen, the crown jewel of insects that grows in strength for every creepy crawler it cannibalizes. Will Weevil's royal ravager swarm Joey into submission?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 1 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 2 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.
programme.sub-title: Double Duel Part 3 - Yugi and Kabia Vs. Lumis and Umbra

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Brook remembers the painful loss of his beloved captain, the tragic end to his musical pirate crew, and his lonely days as a skeleton adrift in the shadows.
programme.sub-title: BINK'S BREW / THE SONG THAT CONNECTS THE PAST WITH THE PRESENT

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Brook officially signs on as the newest member of the Straw Hats, and Luffy learns that his brother Ace may be in some serious trouble.
programme.sub-title: A NEW CREWMATE! THE MUSICIAN, HUMMING BROOK

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Straw Hats encounter two young girls who are looking for their father, and Luffy has another run in with the devious Captain Foxy!
programme.sub-title: THE SLOW-SLOW MENACE / "SILVER FOX" FOXY RETURNS

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and the Straw Hats attempt to destroy a floating resort in order to reunite two sisters who possess a blueprint for making jewels!
programme.sub-title: THE GREAT SCRAMBLE FOR TREASURE / COLLAPSE! SPA ISLAND

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Brook struggles to adjust to life among living after so many years alone in the darkness. Can the Straw Hats survive his chaotic attempts to fit in?
programme.sub-title: BROOK'S GREAT STRUGGLE / IS THE PATH TO BECOMING A TRUE COMRADE RIGOROUS?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: A mysterious country, a rampaging slasher, ancient samurai rituals of seppuku - and Zoro in the crosshairs! When a street assault occurs, all signs point to Zoro! Meanwhile, Luffy finally arrives at the Land of Wano.
programme.sub-title: The Land of Wano! To the Samurai Country where Cherry Blossoms Flutter!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Stranded alone on the beach, Luffy tries to gather his bearings only to be confronted by some mysterious, and dangerous, local fauna! And then, he meets a little girl named Otama! Meanwhile, Zoro makes trouble for the others who are trying to blend in!
programme.sub-title: Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido's Army!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Otama's gratitude towards Luffy knows no bounds! But the feast she cooks him exhausts her food stores completely! As she suffers from poor drinking water, her companion tells the story of the mysterious outsider she waits for - Ace!
programme.sub-title: He'll Come! The Legend of Ace in the Land of Wano!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Ambushed and outgunned by a skilled bounty hunter Cidre's group, the Straw Hats rely on the Sunny's Coup de Burst to escape! But they end up stranded without cola! A nearby soda island offers a solution.
programme.sub-title: Side Story! The World's Greatest Bounty Hunter, Cidre!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and Boa Hancock square off against the Cidre Guild! These unscrupulous bounty hunters have one thing in mind - profit at any cost! When the battle looks won, Cidre gears up in a menacing power suit!
programme.sub-title: Side Story! Clash! Luffy vs. the King of Carbonation!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Otama recounts her promise to Ace while Luffy rushes her to medical attention. But just as they reach the wasteland, a familiar face comes into view! But Kaido's underlings show up too!
programme.sub-title: Save Otama! Straw Hat, Bounding through the Wasteland!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Otama's temperature is going up and Luffy has no time to waste! However, Hawkins, one of Kaido's Headliners, blocks their way by showing his unique powers and skills which can harm his own men.
programme.sub-title: The Headliner! Hawkins the Magician Appears!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy and Zoro have been stalled by Hawkins but their fortune looks bright as they are guided by a woman who Zoro had saved. She leads them to a teahouse and to an herbal remedy for the river poison.
programme.sub-title: Defeat is Inevitable! The Strawman's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Otama's life is saved by Otsuru at her teahouse. The proud Otama finds it hard to take more kindness. The group learns of the Okobore Town - living on the cast-offs of the officials! Then, suddenly, they were attacked by the Shogun's men!
programme.sub-title: The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Otama has been kidnapped by the Gifters! She is taken to a flourishing town called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking Headliner was expecting her. Luffy and Zoro rush to rescue her along with a samurai, Okiku!
programme.sub-title: Charging into the Enemy's Territory! Bakura Town - Where Officials Thrive!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: As Luffy, Zoro, and Okiku bounce through Bakura Town on Komachiyo's back, a sumo wrestler comes flying towards them! Interested, they go down to watch sumo but the undefeated yokozuna Urashima has been expecting Okiku there.
programme.sub-title: The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in the Land of Wano, to a sumo match! Urashima even uses illegal moves to beat Luffy at any cost! Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he knows she committed a crime and he has to punish her for it.
programme.sub-title: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After sending the yokozuna Urashima flying, Luffy and his clan continue their search for Bakura Town's boss to save Otama! They finally find the boss, Holdem, one of the Beast Pirates' Headliners.
programme.sub-title: Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Facing Holdem who is holding Otama as hostage, Luffy prepares for a fight but Okiku tries to stop him by sharing who is really ruling the region. Meanwhile, Basil Hawkins is confronted by a mysterious figure.
programme.sub-title: Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Taking down Holdem, Luffy rescues Otama and tries to catch up to Zoro and Okiku who stole the food treasure ship and started a mad dash to get out of the town!
programme.sub-title: Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: This is a story of Luffy in an alternate reality. While sailing on the sea by himself, a strange bird crashes into his small boat. He looks up to find a giant ship where a girl named Ann has been captured. It seems like the bird belongs to her.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro and the others dash out of BakuraTown on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them bringing ahuge bucket of fresh water! Then, they distribute the food and the water to thepeople of Okobore Town who were thirsty and hungry.
programme.sub-title: The Coming of the Treasure Ship! LuffytaroReturns the Favor!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy arrives at the ruins of Oden Castle following Law and finds the graves of his friends, Kin'emon and the others. As Law starts telling the already-stunned Luffy about the creepy story of Kin'emon's ghost, Luffy sees it coming towards him!
programme.sub-title: Mysterious Grave Markers! A Reunion at the Ruins of Oden Castle!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Kin'emon tells Luffy and the others about how Kozuki Oden made Kuri into a peaceful region and became its Daimyo. However, he was set up by Kaido and Kurozumi Orochi and executed.
programme.sub-title: A Legendary Samurai! The Man Who Roger Admired!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Kin'emon and the others crossed through time by the power of Kozuki Toki, Momonosuke's mother, and arrived at the Land of Wano 20 years later, a totally different country before their eyes.
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down the Emperor of the Sea! A Secret Raid Operation Begins!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Ashura Doji, one of the allies Kin'emon wants to search for, has become the head of a thieves brigade and they now raid Okobore Town taking away the food that Luffy gave to the people.
programme.sub-title: The Strongest Man in the World! Shutenmaru, the Thieves Brigade Chief!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The drunken Kaido flies above Okobore Town in his dragon form and threatens Shutenmaru and all the people in the town. Luffy, Law, Kin'emon, and Okiku start running towards the town to rescue them.
programme.sub-title: Everyone is Annihilated! Kaido's Furious Blast Breath!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After Luffy sees Kaido shattering the ruins of Oden Castle where he left his friends, he becomes enraged and attacks Kaido! Soon after, he finds out Kaido even assaulted Otama who was riding on Speed's back to her home.
programme.sub-title: Finally Clashing! The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: An infuriated Luffy strikes blow after blow on the drunken Kaido. When he activates Gear Four Bounce-Man and launches even more powerful attacks, Kaido fights back and knocks him out with just one blow.
programme.sub-title: Destructive! One Shot, One Kill – Thunder Bagua!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy gets beaten by Kaido and is sent to a great mine where prisoners are made to work in forced labor. There, he finds an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, Okiku is rushing to the ruins of Oden Castle.
programme.sub-title: A Living Hell! Luffy, Humiliated in the Great Mine!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: On Gloom Island in the Grand Line, Perona finds out that her captain, Gecko Moria, is alive and she is about to leave Dracule Mihawk who let her stay there for the last two years. Meanwhile,
programme.sub-title: The Holyland in Tumult! Emperor of the Sea Blackbeard Cackles!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Dogstorm fights against Shutenmaru to ally with him for their operation but Shutenmaru still rejects their call.
programme.sub-title: It's On! The Special Operation to Bring Down Kaido!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: In the Excavation Labor Camp, Luffy competes against Kid by hauling stones for food and they both get tons of it. However, Dobon, a vice warden, becomes furious when he finds out all their provisions are gone, and gives Luffy and Kid a new sentence.
programme.sub-title: Rampage! The Prisoners – Luffy and Kid!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko smiles deviously as she points her gun at Lupin, when Zenigata arrives to save him and Ami. They get into the inspector's car which takes off, but it's soon attacked by soldiers who are trying to cash in the price on Lupin's head.
programme.sub-title: Zenigata's Pride and the Desert Dust

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot in the head by a drone fighter. With the death of its target, the Lupin Game is concluded. Time passes, and people forget about the game. Released from his duty of hunting Lupin, Ami now lives with Zenigata, when one day Goemon visits her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: The "Smart Safe" has come to the Greater Tokyo Bank. Lupin is goaded by Fujiko and Jigen to try and crack the technological wonder. What can he do against this peculiarly secure safe?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is hired by Gaston to retrieve a painting, and manages to do so easily enough... except the painting has a strange resemblance to a real Picasso piece, forcing Lupin to examine the truth behind why he was hired.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin visits Gaston's grave. There he meets the elderly Camille, with who he goes out for a drink when the pub's phone begins to ring. On the other end of the line is the supposedly dead Gaston.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is shot, and Albert gets his hands on the notebook. Lupin is saved by Jigen and Goemon and manages to survive his injuries under care. He then explains his past with Albert and how they know each other.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: After learning the shocking truth about Jose's terrifying plot, Lupin heads to Jose's headquarters with Albert, his old thieving comrade. Jigen and Goemon fight off the heaviest opposition while Lupin and Albert head into the heart of the enemy territory.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: To steal the fortune of the Drug King Pablo, the gang heads to South America with Fujiko. As Fujiko distracts the target, Lupin picks off the remains of Pablo's guards while making his way through the jungle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop-cultural event is Goemon. Next to the inn, he decides to keep watch at is Chloé's Bistro. Chloé is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin's current target.
programme.sub-title: The Extravagance of Goemon Ishikawa XIII

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Having enrolled at the Annecy School for Girls, Ami encounters a strange girl in the garden who aims her bow at a crow. The girl is Dolma, the princess of the Kingdom of Padar. Having no friends, Ami finds herself opening up to the odd Dolma.
programme.sub-title: The Bow, The Princess, and the Terrorist

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Princess Dolma, please save Padar." With that request, Dolma is taken home. Lupin follows shortly, and Ami decides to accompany Fujiko to Padar in order to save Dolma.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin is pierced by Dolma's arrow. Ami and Fujiko take Lupin and escape, hiding in a deserted building. The three of them decide to flee, with Lupin badly injured.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Padar sinks into chaos because of the civil war, but things take a sudden turn when the Shake Hands company gets involved. A proclamation by the king is posted online, proving him to be alive.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Shortly after moving into the hideout in Riquewihr, Lupin wakes up to a broken bathroom. After bickering with Jigen for access to the bathroom, Fujiko appears.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin's gang visits the Northern Angel, on the outskirts of Russia. What at first seems like a snowy, dull town turns out to be full of riches to the joy of the group of thieves.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: "Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.
programme.sub-title: Just Then, An Old Buddy Said Something

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin receives an invitation to join a race by Mr. X. Jigen and Goemon questions Lupin's willingness to join despite knowing it's a trap, but Lupin has his eyes on the Golden Statue rumored to be in a mansion near the race course.
programme.sub-title: 50th Anniversary Special - Is Lupin Still Burning?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels
programme.desc: Lupin faces his toughest opponents yet! Four women known as the Bloody Angels are after the strange metallic sphere he stole from Area 51. To get their hands on potential alien technology, they're willing to do anything.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #19: The Elusiveness of the Fog
programme.desc: Lupin's attempt to steal a time machine causes a crazy mishap! Now stuck in ancient Japan, his team and Inspector Zenigata must join forces to get back to their own time. But notorious thief Lupin has enemies everywhere... and everywhen!

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #20: Sweet Lost Night
programme.desc: Turns out the Magic Lamp is real, and Lupin's found a way to steal it! But this genie has a price: to grant his wish, she demands half his memories.

programme.title: Timecop
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Cyborg
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Born in the flames of hell and brought to Earth, Hellboy was rescued from sinister forces by the benevolent Dr. Broom, who raised him to be a hero. Hellboy stands as the key line of defense against an evil madman who seeks to destroy mankind.

programme.title: Lifeforce
programme.desc: A frightening journey into the unknown awaits an Earthbound scout ship when it comes across an alien spacecraft of enormous proportions. Further investigation reveals a roomful of glass coffins containing the bodies of frozen creatures.

programme.title: Supernova
programme.desc: "Supernova" chronicles the search and rescue patrol of a deep space medical ship and its six-member crew.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: In 2047, a team of astronauts embarks on a mission to retrieve a missing spaceship. However, their simple retrieval job leads to something far more terrifying than any of them would suspect.

programme.title: Gattaca

programme.title: Moon
programme.desc: Sam Bell (Sam Rockwell) is nearing the completion of his 3-year-long contract with Lunar Industries, mining Earth's primary source of energy on the dark side of the moon.

Halfway through a 10 year mission in deep space, a group of astronauts awaken to find Earth has suffered a catastrophic event. The already unstable crew desperately races to repair their deteriorating space station and fight off unforeseen threats.

programme.title: Guns of The Magnificent Seven

programme.title: Breakheart Pass

programme.title: The Legend Of the Lone Ranger
